commit message:
set android:versionCode = 2, android:versionName='0.7.1'
in other words: bumped correctly...
lat_lon_fixer now keeps a backup of unchanged source files
Minor change: Improved gps signal validation
Lat/Lon-Fixer: included lat/lon bug in 00.7.00 (end tag)
EXPERIMENTAL: Block mobile wifis by SSID (BSSID upcoming)
Bumped to version 0.7.2
Added cell network types in api >= 11

New Wifi Overview option: sort by ssid or timestamp
(http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=22)
Merged http://www.gitorious.org/openbmap/openbmap/raw/e579c96eac30fcb78987ffa2c86c7983c7f02f61:tools/wifi_db_builder/1%20add_raw_wifis_to_db.py
Merged http://www.gitorious.org/openbmap/openbmap/source/e579c96eac30fcb78987ffa2c86c7983c7f02f61:tools/cell_db_builder
Merged changes from http://www.gitorious.org/openbmap/openbmap/source/e579c96eac30fcb78987ffa2c86c7983c7f02f61:tools
Experimental: Switched from Mapsforge 0.3.1 to Mapsforge 0.4.0 (rewrite)
- Added map zoom buttons
Changed map download urls

Check for valid position before saving wifi
(related to http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=29)

Removed fail-safe zoom
(http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=17)

added simple map generator (requisites: osmosis 0.42, mapsforge-writer plugin, not included!)
see file comments in generate_maps.bat for further details
Layers were not refreshed after onPause.. Fixed
Experimental: Basic heatmap support in wifi details view
Fixing http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=27
Wifi Details: Show channel instead of only frequency

Addressing http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=31
Changed to database raw access when loading session objects

Fixing GPX filename template
(http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=32)
Also scan for new gpx files
Changed sort order: display newest wifis first
Performance tweak: if we just need active session's id, won't de-serialize complete session object anymore
Improved wifi heat map support
Minor cleanups: Cell detail layout, sort order wifis

Fixed some cell logging issue (better handling of non-gsm cells; added psc code to exported xml; retry cell update immediately after failed attempt; UI: Cell Details updated)

Bumped to version 0.7.04

Bumped to 0.7.04
(AndroidManifest.xml updates was missing in last commit)
